description: A new day, a new opportunity to make a difference. Stay on top of your schedule and keep delivering the best care possible!
KDS about paragraph: KDS is an Algerian company specialized in the import and distribution of medical-surgical equipment, medical devices, laboratory equipment and scientific consumables. It serves healthcare professionals, laboratories, research centers and hospitals.

about.title: About KDS
about.paragraph1: KDS is an Algerian company specialized in the import and distribution of medical-surgical equipment, medical devices, laboratory equipment, and scientific consumables. It serves healthcare professionals, laboratories, research centers, and hospitals.
about.paragraph2: A subsidiary of BDCOM, founded in 1998, KDS offers high-quality technical solutions compliant with international standards.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.paragraph: We place listening, advice, training, and follow-up at the heart of our approach, aiming to become the reference partner for demanding professionals.

biopsy.title: üî¨ Biopsy
biopsy.text: Precise devices for tissue sampling, compatible with medical imaging. Needles, trocars, automatic guns, sterile kits, etc.

karyotyping.title: üß¨ Karyotyping
karyotyping.text: Equipment for chromosomal analysis (mitotic & prenatal), Synchroset, microscopes, specialized reagents.

qpcr.title: ‚öóÔ∏è Real-time PCR (qPCR)
qpcr.text: Solutions for genetics, hematopathology, microbiology. Thermal cyclers, qPCR kits, probes, and technical support.

cytogenetics.title: üß´ Cytogenetics
cytogenetics.text: Specialized media, FISH probes, fluorescence microscopes, hybridization chambers, etc. For hematology, complex pathologies, microdeletions.

lab_equipment.title: üß™ Laboratory Equipment
lab_equipment.text: Centrifuges, hoods, incubators, plate readers, autoclaves, ISO/CE equipment with local after-sales service.

consumables.title: üß¥ Consumables
consumables.text: PCR tubes, tips, slides, gloves, biohazard bags, sterile protections... Compatible, reliable, compliant with standards.

support.title: Comprehensive Support
list: Continuous availability of consumables & spare parts
support.paragraph: We place human relationships at the heart of our business: every client is a partner.

bdcom.title: A Solid Foundation: BDCOM
bdcom.text: BDCOM, founded in 1998, is KDS‚Äôs parent company. With a strong international network and experience in medical equipment, it enabled the creation of KDS to meet the sector‚Äôs new technological needs.

future.title: Together Towards the Future
future.text: KDS aims to remain at the forefront of medical innovation in Algeria, with a skilled team, an evolving catalog, and close customer service.

sectionTwoHomeKDSDescreption: Specialized in the import and distribution of medical-surgical equipment and medical devices, we support healthcare professionals with reliable, innovative, and tailored solutions to meet their needs. Our expertise covers a wide range of fields, from biopsy, real-time PCR, karyotyping, and cytogenetics to other key areas of diagnostics and biomedical research. Through constant monitoring and a rigorous selection of our products, we are committed to ensuring performance, safety, and quality in every piece of equipment we provide.
